content.description:
Sit start with a hands matched on the left most sloping feature. From there, move right to a jug, set a left heel hook, reach a left hand crimp, stick the lip, and then finish up through the jug to reach a solid top out.

I sent this problem, and it went to hell soon after. A small hold at the lip broke, and the main jug busted off as well. There are still plenty of holds to be used, but it likely goes much harder now.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing pads well, but there is a rock in the middle of things.
content.location: It climbs the south facing overhang of Gorgoroth.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on the jug.  From there, traverse left using the jug and crimps until reaching the opposing lip.  At that point, head straight up the arete using the slopers and jugs for a solid topout.
content.protection: A few pads, the landing is good but slightly sloping.
content.location: This is on the north face of Gorgoroth Rock.

content.description: Sit start with hands match on the left most dish. From there, move right to the broken dish, then move up to a crimp, negotiate the nose, finish the remainder for a solid top out.
content.protection: Pair of pads will work fine. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the north facing nose of Gorgoroth.
